title: Apple may discontinue its old AirPods when it releases new ones, otherwise you wonâ€™t buy them
content:
When Apple releases a new product in a certain lineup, it usually takes one of two routes. It either discontinues the previous-gen model, or it discounts it and keeps it on sale. The company usually goes for the latter option when the new device includes significant changes or price bump. That leaves people the option

The post Apple may discontinue its old AirPods when it releases new ones, otherwise you won’t buy them appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Apple could be discontinuing the first generation AirPods Pro when it releases the second-gen model, possibly later this year.
